title: Cointxz
author: Cointxz
content: I decided to share this story since this is my first time winning big on a slot game since I’m not a fan of slot games personally. I was watching one of the highlights video of streamer xposed in the youtube and see him winning big time on stack em by hacksawgaming slot. I’m not a fan of slot game especially this provider due to high volatility game yet I still play the game after watching him winning huge multiplier.Click the image to watch the full video of xposedI try a couple of buy bonus worth 25$ and I hit x3800 using 0.2$ on my 5th buy bonus which insane since it almost same experience when I watch the streamer video. This kind of event is like dream come true since I never imagine winning same with the video I watch even though there’s a difference on the winning amount.This is my winning screenshot.Sometimes watching streamer and being motivated to play unknown games to us brings luck out of nowhere. Keep on trying but just don’t over commit. Trying the unknown and winning big time is really fun experience.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Congratulations. Buy bonus work like magic many times. If I remember correctly, the buy bonus I used the first time while gambling gave me huge amount of money, not working for me like before and sometimes it may not be a huge amount won. But buy bonus is still one of the ways gamblers can win huge while gambling. I am not saying it can not lead to losses because buy bonus can lead to losses despite the chance to win huge amount of money is higher than not playing with buy bonus. But higher amount is also used for buy bonus which make the risk to be higher.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on November 16, 2023, 08:17:45 AMCongratulations. Buy bonus work like magic many times. If I remember correctly, the buy bonus I used the first time while gambling gave me huge amount of money, not working for me like before and sometimes it may not be a huge amount won. But buy bonus is still one of the ways gamblers can win huge while gambling. I am not saying it can not lead to losses because buy bonus can lead to losses despite the chance to win huge amount of money is higher than not playing with buy bonus. But higher amount is also used for buy bonus which make the risk to be higher.maybe you weren't so lucky in all of those times that's why it turned out the way it did for you, hopefully you could be fortunate next time again to get a bountiful win. Never say never.Slot games are thoroughly based on luck and not how much you know about the games unlike sports betting, for slot you have to rely on luck and if it's not your lucky day yet in spite of how much you might want to be unperturbed by trying more you just keep losing more money. So when it's not your day it's just not your day.

comments.author: Amphenomenon
comments.body: Wow congrats, can you share the link to video will love to try it also, probably with the same $0.25. I don't stake big, prefer staking little with large odd, because when it finally works I do get it big after little or much fails but its how I like it and I know it is more like depending on Luck but as long as I'm not addicted to it it's all good to and its works well for me

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: QuoteTrying the unknown and winning big time is really fun experience.Sometimes when we move out of our comfort zone, new surprises come our way. Perhaps I could try going out of my way too but playing responsibly of course.Congratulations for your first time big win on slot game. Sharing the streamer's link can also encourage more gamblers to follow up.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: Amphenomenon on November 16, 2023, 08:26:12 AMWow congrats, can you share the link to video will love to try it also, Sadly betting history is not available anymore when I check the slot game bet history. I won this spin 2 days ago and I thought that betting history still remains for a long time. I didn’t manage to share the post here immediately since I close the game immediately that time when I won since I’m very happy that time. The good part is I purchased my winnings when Bitcoin drop yesterday and gain more profit out of it.Quote from: Amphenomenon on November 16, 2023, 08:26:12 AM probably with the same $0.25. I don't stake big, prefer staking little with large odd, because when it finally works I do get it big after little or much fails but its how I like it and I know it is more like depending on Luck but as long as I'm not addicted to it it's all good to and its works well for me Yeah, I intended to play small too on slot games most of the time since I’m not comfortable playing this game. I just become motivated when I watch this specific slot game due to graphics and the streamer win huge multiplier. You’ll never know when luck hits us hard so it’s important to keep trying but not in addictive way.

comments.author: cryptomaniac_xxx
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on November 16, 2023, 08:17:45 AMCongratulations. Buy bonus work like magic many times. If I remember correctly, the buy bonus I used the first time while gambling gave me huge amount of money, not working for me like before and sometimes it may not be a huge amount won. But buy bonus is still one of the ways gamblers can win huge while gambling. I am not saying it can not lead to losses because buy bonus can lead to losses despite the chance to win huge amount of money is higher than not playing with buy bonus. But higher amount is also used for buy bonus which make the risk to be higher.Right, just two days, someone tell me a story that he won big game on Alibaba by using the buy bonus. So I try to replicate and play that game and used that buy bonus. Although I didn't win as huge as he his because he has more capital than me, still though I won big and I'm happy for that. And same thing as well, I told him that I won in mahjong slot games and he tried and he showed me screen shots on how much money he won. Perhaps we could connect this as what the OP tells us. He watch some streamers and so he is entice to play the same game and motivated to get a big win as well and so it does happen. Not saying that it will always bring us good fortune, but I guess staying positive might end up with a good results.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Quote from: Coin_trader on November 16, 2023, 08:07:14 AMSometimes watching streamer and being motivated to play unknown games to us brings luck out of nowhere. Keep on trying but just don’t over commit. Trying the unknown and winning big time is really fun experience.Or maybe it was your lucky day or night for that matter that after the streamer winning big, you just decided to try your "luck". Don't get me wrong, I also love to watch streamers from time to time and see how they are doing, but being just a regular gambler, not sure if I can win big just like them.Nevertheless, I love your advise of don't over commit. Really hard to do though, but it's really good to learn how to quit and not take anymore damage as we all know that if we play long hours in any kind of game that is base on luck, the odds will be against us. So just enjoy every roll of the machine or whatever your favorite game is.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: btc_angela on November 16, 2023, 10:00:28 AMOr maybe it was your lucky day or night for that matter that after the streamer winning big, you just decided to try your "luck". Don't get me wrong, I also love to watch streamers from time to time and see how they are doing, but being just a regular gambler, not sure if I can win big just like them.That is just it, it was his lucky day. But bonus buy can make the probability of that to increase if compared with other bets, bonus buy helps gamblers to win more. But in the process that some people want to win huge and they use bonus buy, more money is required and this can lead to more loss. So we can still say that is his lucky day.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Coin_trader on November 16, 2023, 08:07:14 AMSometimes watching streamer and being motivated to play unknown games to us brings luck out of nowhere. Keep on trying but just don’t over commit. Trying the unknown and winning big time is really fun experience.Congratulations on your winning, sometimes luck comes from an unexpected place or unexpected times and yours comes from a streamer, this streamer may be good at giving tips he has huge followers, and it is good that he has a disclaimer posted first before his stream because in gambling especially in luck based game you really can't be sure of winning.I'm sure many of those who read your thread will try and check out other streamers and see if they find something in those streams that will give them tips on how to win on slots and other luck based games.

comments.author: angrybirdy

I was watching one of the highlights video of streamer xposed in the youtube and see him winning big time on stack em by hacksawgaming slot. I’m not a fan of slot game especially this provider due to high volatility game yet I still play the game after watching him winning huge multiplier.Click the image to watch the full video of xposedI try a couple of buy bonus worth 25$ and I hit x3800 using 0.2$ on my 5th buy bonus which insane since it almost same experience when I watch the streamer video. This kind of event is like dream come true since I never imagine winning same with the video I watch even though there’s a difference on the winning amount.This is my winning screenshot.Sometimes watching streamer and being motivated to play unknown games to us brings luck out of nowhere. Keep on trying but just don’t over commit. Trying the unknown and winning big time is really fun experience.Congratulations on your winning, mate! I can say that you're lucky enough for winning big today. That's true that watching a streamers will gives you a motivation to win, May I ask if this is your first time in playing? because I do believe in beginners luck but it is applicable for some people only. Just like you, I used to watch streamers too because somehow you will get some gambling strategy from them and you may use it once you're the one is playing. So yeah, Congrats again on your winning, and thanks for the advice. Just keep on trying and don't over commit.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Quote from: Coin_trader on November 16, 2023, 08:07:14 AMI try a couple of buy bonus worth 25$ and I hit x3800 using 0.2$ on my 5th buy bonus which insane since it almost same experience when I watch the streamer video. This kind of event is like dream come true since I never imagine winning same with the video I watch even though there’s a difference on the winning amount.This is my winning screenshot.It is a big win for you, congratulations.I also would like to know one more thing about this win. After winning big, did you submit any withdrawal and did they approve, proceed that withdrawal for you?If they are legit, they will allow you to withdraw your money. If they only give you big wins from bonus and use it as a hook to convince you deposit more money to your account to bet more, with hope to win bigger and can withdraw a massive big win from your own money, it can be a scam platform.At the end they might refuse any withdrawal and you lose your money deposited in your account on their platform.

comments.author: davis196
comments.body: Congratulations. Did you manage to successfully withdraw your profits?What's the point of this forum thread? Bragging about your winning or trying to find a weird connection between watching this particular streamer and your profit? I can't find such connection other than what you have mentioned(being motivated to gamble by watching other people gambling). You were lucky. Enjoy your profits, but I don't think that you will have any luck, if you start playing slot games every day.I hate watching gambling streamers. It seems sketchy to me and it's a waste of time. I'm not going to learn anything new about gambling just by watching a streamer waste his money on slots games(he is getting paid to do this, so he doesn't lose anything actually).

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Good to know.At least people who are watching the stream, are just for educational purposes for the type game or slot we are gonna to play. Just don't hope, while streamer win big on these slot and you have high hope for you to win a lot on the slot.Nice hit BTW.

I can't find such connection other than what you have mentioned(being motivated to gamble by watching other people gambling). You were lucky. Enjoy your profits, but I don't think that you will have any luck, if you start playing slot games every day.I hate watching gambling streamers. It seems sketchy to me and it's a waste of time. If he is really just that watching someone like a streamer and did make on the same hit just like on that guy whom he had watchedthen it is really that giving out that kind of suspicion or it is really just that coincidence if we do speak or talk about a legit platform or provider.It is really just that unusual or not really that common thatwinning up when you do follow someone considering that slot gaming is really that totally random, hitting up on the same scenario is really just that amazing if this is really legit.For sure he is really that pertaining on that odd event on hitting on the same just like on the streamer that he had been watching. Somewhat that flexing his wins?I dont see such thing but i do understand that people do really love on sharing whenever they have experienced something first time ever sinceon which its better to understand on how they do feel.

comments.author: Jody.Drummer
comments.body: Quote from: angrybirdy on November 16, 2023, 10:58:01 AMCongratulations on your winning, mate! I can say that you're lucky enough for winning big today. That's true that watching a streamers will gives you a motivation to win, May I ask if this is your first time in playing? because I do believe in beginners luck but it is applicable for some people only. Just like you, I used to watch streamers too because somehow you will get some gambling strategy from them and you may use it once you're the one is playing. So yeah, Congrats again on your winning, and thanks for the advice. Just keep on trying and don't over commit. Maybe OP was really lucky that day so he could get a win with a large enough amount in my opinion. Honestly, I have never watched stremer to be able to motivate my gambling, because before I never thought of doing that and also never felt that by watching stremer I would have higher confidence to win, yes that means everyone has their own way in every gambling, if indeed that way is effective enough for you then do it but also must be with a full level of caution, because of course it is not unusual if the final result does not match what you expected.That's right, even though it works for them, it doesn't mean that it won't work for us, it's possible. And for myself maybe I will just enjoy gambling with my own beliefs and ways, I will be able to enjoy my gambling more in my own way, because I come not too much hope for victory but more for entertainment. I don't think there is a single accurate strategy for better results because of course everything will go randomly and only luck will help us to realize such hopes.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Congratulations @OP, this thread reminds me to Gambling and Superstition.I believe you will try to watch the streamer before you gambling, in hoping you will get a same luck lol. Well it will not work anymore, if you believe about such thing you will try to find other thing that you thought it will make you lucky.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Quote from: Coin_trader on November 16, 2023, 08:07:14 AM~Damn, I must say nice hit. I rarely, or never actually watched streamers betting. Even if I did tune it, I'd only be looking at what they're playing/doing then bail tf out since I've never really enjoyed watching people gamble themselves. Highly doubt I'd even get lucky even if I started watching one as well. I guess it's a different thing if it was sports gambling though, now that I would watch since technically they'd be watching the game itself instead of say, dice. Wouldn't say lucky days are due to streamers anyway, all you OP. Congrats again!

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Quote from: Coin_trader on November 16, 2023, 09:10:49 AM-snipYeah, I intended to play small too on slot games most of the time since I’m not comfortable playing this game. I just become motivated when I watch this specific slot game due to graphics and the streamer win huge multiplier. You’ll never know when luck hits us hard so it’s important to keep trying but not in addictive way.Congratulations! That's an amazing story and an incredible win. It's always thrilling when luck is on your side, especially hearing about someone hitting it big on a slot machine. It's interesting how witnessing others succeed can inspire and motivate us to try new and unexpected things. We share the same approach of using small stakes in gambling. I feel fortunate when I do that, and it's a fun way to discover new games.Thanks for sharing your story, and I hope your good luck continues. Wishing you more fortunate spins and success in your future endeavors!
